DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study estimate direct cost associate switch , either direction , rapid-acting analog therapy short-acting human insulin therapy within first year follow switch . The additional goal : 1 ) ass impact switch rapid-acting analog insulin therapy patient treatment satisfaction , 2 ) ass impact switch rapid-acting analog insulin therapy patient quality life , 3 ) ass impact switch rapid-acting analog insulin therapy quality metabolic control , 4 ) estimate total cost ( direct indirect ) associate switching , either direction rapid-acting analog short-acting human insulin within first year follow switch .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Evaluating Patient Satisfaction Quality Life Associated With Switching Insulin
